item.description:
SATURDAY MAY 21 - 2pm CTMatch.com SINGLES Golfing Lessons and After Party

Learn to Play Golf * Improve Your Golf Skills * Party with Local Singles
Make New Friends and Golfing Buddies

CUSTOMIZED GOLF LESSONS FOR ALL LEVELS OF GOLFER
From Beginners To Experienced Golfers
with 2010 United States Golf Teachers Federation Top 100 World Certified Golf Teaching Professional George Claffey

Golf Lessons start at 2pm and run to 5pm from 2010
and include putting, chipping, and the driving range
AFTERPARTY starts at 5pm


Billy Tee's at
Torza's Professional Golf Center
150 Sebethe Drive
Cromwell CT 04614

Space is Limited to 20 Golfers - Get your ticket today!

Tickets are $60 - includes Golf Lessons, Equipment, Fees and After Party
Advance Ticket Discount - only $50

Visit http://www.CTMatch.com or CLICK HERE
Call (860) 236-3343
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at Billy Tee's Outdoor Patio at 2pm
